Section.title: Package com.io7m.cedarbridge

Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The com.io7m.cedarbridge package declares a set of generally useful types.

Subsection.title: IntegerUnsigned8
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerUnsigned8 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [0, 255].

Subsection.title: IntegerUnsigned16
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerUnsigned16 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [0, 65535].

Subsection.title: IntegerUnsigned32
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerUnsigned32 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [0, 4294967295].

Subsection.title: IntegerUnsigned64
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerUnsigned64 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [0, 18446744073709551615].

Subsection.title: IntegerSigned8
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerSigned8 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [-128, 127].

Subsection.title: IntegerSigned16
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerSigned16 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [-32768, 32767].

Subsection.title: IntegerSigned32
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerSigned32 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [-2147483648, 2147483647].

Subsection.title: IntegerSigned64
Subsection.Paragraph: The IntegerSigned64 type is an opaque type that can hold values in the range [-9223372036854775808, 9223372036854775807].

Subsection.title: String
Subsection.Paragraph: The String type is an opaque type that can hold a sequence of at most 4294967295 octets of UTF-8 encoded data.

Subsection.title: ByteArray
Subsection.Paragraph: The ByteArray type is an opaque type that can hold a sequence of at most 4294967295 octets of data.

Subsection.title: Float16
Subsection.Paragraph: The Float16 type is an opaque type that can hold a single IEEE-754 Binary16 value.

Subsection.title: Float32
Subsection.Paragraph: The Float32 type is an opaque type that can hold a single IEEE-754 Binary32 value.

Subsection.title: Float64
Subsection.Paragraph: The Float64 type is an opaque type that can hold a single IEEE-754 Binary64 value.

Subsection.title: List
Subsection.Paragraph: The List type is an opaque type that can hold a sequence of values of a type equal to the single type parameter.

Subsection.title: Option
Subsection.Paragraph: The Option type is an type that can hold zero or one values of a type equal to the single type parameter. The type is equivalent to the following variant declaration:

FormalItem.title: Option Type
FormalItem.Verbatim: (variant Option [parameter A] [case None] [case Some (field value A)])

Subsection.title: MapEntry
Subsection.Paragraph: The MapEntry type is a type used to hold a single entry in a Map. The type is equivalent to the following record declaration:

FormalItem.title: MapEntry Type
FormalItem.Verbatim: (record MapEntry [parameter K] [parameter V] [field key K] [field value V])

Subsection.title: Map
Subsection.Paragraph: The Map type is a type used to hold a sequence of entries. The type is equivalent to the following record declaration:

FormalItem.title: Map Type
FormalItem.Verbatim: (record Map [parameter K] [parameter V] [field entries (List [MapEntry K V])])

Section.Footnote: IEEE Standard for Floating-Point Arithmetic (IEEE 754), or equivalently ISO/IEC 60559:2020.
